task.summary: Added editing capability to fix wonky posts. Still need to be able to edit the image, but that will come next.
CSS changes to fix the menu to the top.
added the ability to change the headline image.
updates to CSS for header images
Rebuilding app for greater flexibility. Now as a package, not just a module. should be a bit easier.
